alert.note: Alert for Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lexington and central Richland Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cayce, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbia, West Columbia, Cayce, Forest Acres, Springdale, St. Andrews, Dentsville, Oak Grove, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Arcadia Lakes, Villages at Sandhill, Columbia International University, Horrel Hill, Killian, Riverbanks Zoo, SC State Farmer`s Market, Woodfield, Sesquicentennial State Park and Columbia Metro Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 59 and 82. Interstate 26 between mile markers 106 and 120. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
